price: We have explained every kind of example[79] for mankind in this Qur’an, yet most people persist in disbelief.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
footnotes: [79] i.e., proofs, admonitions, similitudes, and stories, so that people of sound reason may take heed.
